description: misc/vim: simple go vim plugin symlink installer.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

Thanks, but no thanks. There's three lines at the top of readme.txt
that people can add to their .vimrc to fully use the features; there's
no need for a program to set up all the individual symlinks.

On 2012/03/10 22:52:54, dsymonds wrote:
> Thanks, but no thanks. There's three lines at the top of readme.txt
> that people can add to their .vimrc to fully use the features; there's
> no need for a program to set up all the individual symlinks.

Understood, I'll just move it to my personal stuff, since I have a use case for it.

subject: code review 5797059: misc/vim: simple go vim plugin symlink installer.
